scripts.deploy_bsc_production: cp ./src/multiChain/constantsBSC.ts ./src/constants.ts && graph codegen subgraphs/bsc.yaml && graph deploy --product hosted-service woonetwork/woofi-bsc subgraphs/bsc.yaml
